bibl.title: Notes on the Temple of Onias at Leontopolis.
Studies in Honor of Miroslav Marcovich
bibl.author: WASSERSTEIN, Abraham

bibl.note: The rabbinic sources speak of the Onias temple as having being located in Alexandria instead of Leontopolis. This could have arisen out of the fact that Alexandria was also called, in their time, Leontopolis.
WASSERSTEIN Abraham, Notes on the Temple of Onias at Leontopolis.
Studies in Honor of Miroslav Marcovich = ICS 18 (1993) pp. 119-129.
